Texts.Chs:
The Kyani are a species of scientists and crafters. Surprisingly, they're the first to be fully made of metallic elements. Their tech went REALLY far ahead, but they're reluctant to share it with others.

食性: Anything

^orange;天赋^reset;:
^green;+15^reset;% Health, ^green;+35^reset;% Energy, ^green;+8^reset; Protection
Resists: ^green;+30^reset;% Physical, ^green;+40^reset;% Fire, ^green;+10^reset;% Poison resistances.
Immune: Burning, 窒息

^orange;Biomes^reset;:
^green;Hot biomes, Lunar and Barren^reset; - ^green;+15^reset;% Health and Energy
^yellow;Lush and Forest^reset; - ^yellow;-15^reset;% Health and Energy
^orange;Rainforest and Jungle^reset; - ^orange;-45^reset;% Health and Energy
^red;Snowy biomes and Ocean^reset; - ^orange;-75^reset;% Health and Energy

^orange;武器^reset;:
With their national weaponry, gain ^green;+20%^reset; damage and ^green;+10%^reset; crit chance.
Sniper rifles:^green;+15^reset;% Damage and ^green;+7^reset;% crit chance.
Grenade Launchers: ^green;+7^reset;% Damage, ^green;+3^reset;% crit chance.

^red;弱点^reset;:
^red;-10^reset;% Damage multiplier.
^red;-40^reset;% Ice,^red;-20^reset;% Electic and ^red;-20^reset;% Radiation Resist.
^red;KEEP AWAY FROM WATER!^reset; It will melt you alive!
Texts.Eng:
The Kyani are a species of scientists and crafters. Surprisingly, they're the first to be fully made of metallic elements. Their tech went REALLY far ahead, but they're reluctant to share it with others.

Diet: Anything

^orange;Perks^reset;:
^green;+15^reset;% Health, ^green;+35^reset;% Energy, ^green;+8^reset; Protection
Resists: ^green;+30^reset;% Physical, ^green;+40^reset;% Fire, ^green;+10^reset;% Poison resistances.
Immune: Burning, Oxygen

^orange;Biomes^reset;:
^green;Hot biomes, Lunar and Barren^reset; - ^green;+15^reset;% Health and Energy
^yellow;Lush and Forest^reset; - ^yellow;-15^reset;% Health and Energy
^orange;Rainforest and Jungle^reset; - ^orange;-45^reset;% Health and Energy
^red;Snowy biomes and Ocean^reset; - ^orange;-75^reset;% Health and Energy

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
With their national weaponry, gain ^green;+20%^reset; damage and ^green;+10%^reset; crit chance.
Sniper rifles:^green;+15^reset;% Damage and ^green;+7^reset;% crit chance.
Grenade Launchers: ^green;+7^reset;% Damage, ^green;+3^reset;% crit chance.

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
^red;-10^reset;% Damage multiplier.
^red;-40^reset;% Ice,^red;-20^reset;% Electic and ^red;-20^reset;% Radiation Resist.
^red;KEEP AWAY FROM WATER!^reset; It will melt you alive!
